page.title: 08MACHINERY
page.content: THE SHEPHERD HAS A LAND ROVER WHICH HE USES TO GO DOWN THE LANE TO FEED THE SHEEP AND HE USES IT TO ROUND UP THE SHEEP. THE TRACTOR IS USED FOR PLOUGHING AND YOU CAN HAVE A FORK LIFT ON IT. A COMBINE HARVESTER IS THE BIGGEST FARM MACHINE. IT IS USED FOR CUTTING THE CORN, WHEAT AND BARLEY.IN THE AUTUMN THE FARMER GOES OUT WITH THE LARGE COMBINE HARVESTER IT CAN CUT ENOUGH WHEAT IN ONE DAY TO MAKE NEARLY 14O OOO LOAVES OF BREAD. WHEN THE TANK IS FULL A LIGHT COMES ON IN THE CAB. A LIGHT ON THE COMBINE COMES ON ALSO TO TELL THE LORRY OR TRACTOR DRIVER TO COLLECT THE WHEAT AND TAKE IT TO THE DRIER.
